> decorator for start a express application direct from the class itself

## Install

```sh
npm i easy-decorators
```

## Code 

```sh
  import { ServerStarter } from 'starter-decorator';

  class App {
      your Application configs
    }

  @ServerStarter(App, 5665)
  class Server {}
```
